Destructor.
Makes sure all columns have minimum width.
Override this member function to add custom behaviour on property deletion.
Override this member function to add custom behaviour on property insertion.
This needs to be overridden in grid used the manager so that splitter changes can be propagated to other pages.
Make sure virtual height is up-to-date.
Returns (precalculated) height of contained visible properties.
Returns (precalculated) height of contained visible properties.
Returns actual height of contained visible properties.

simplesect.para: Mostly used for internal diagnostic purposes.

briefdescription.para: Returns last item which could be iterated using given flags.
Returns currently selected property.

memberdef.name: GetColumnFitWidth

briefdescription.para: Returns minimal width for given column so that all images and texts will fit entirely.
Returns information about arbitrary position in the grid.

parameterdescription.para: Logical coordinates in the virtual grid space. Use wxScrolled<T>::CalcUnscrolledPosition() if you need to translate a scrolled position into a logical one.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if page is visibly displayed.
widthChange is non-client.
Recalculates m_virtualHeight.
Set virtual width for this particular page.
Called after virtual height needs to be recalculated.
Base append.
Returns property by its name.
Called in, for example, wxPropertyGrid::Clear.
Contains low-level property page information (properties, column widths, etc) of a single wxPropertyGrid or single wxPropertyGridPage.

detaileddescription.para: Generally you should not use this class directly, but instead member functions in wxPropertyGridInterface, wxPropertyGrid, wxPropertyGridPage, and wxPropertyGridManager.

listitem.para: In separate wxPropertyGrid component this class was known as wxPropertyGridState.
Currently this class is not implemented in wxPython.
